mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed SET writer_id = #{userId}, contents = #{contents}, location = #{location}
mapper.select: SELECT A.feed_comment_id AS feedCommentId, A.user_id AS writerId, B.nm AS writerNm , B.pic AS writerPic, A.comment, A.created_at AS createdAt FROM feed_comment A JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.user_id WHERE A.feed_id = #{feedId} ORDER BY A.created_at DESC LIMIT 4
